page.title: Judge: Oracle, PeopleSoft Drawn Closer
page.text: WILMINGTON, Del. (Reuters) - The trial pitting software giant Oracle Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ORCL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ORCL.O</A> against unwilling takeover target PeopleSoft Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PSFT.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PSFT.O</A> ended on Friday with a Delaware judge's comment that recent developments seemed to have drawn the bitter rivals closer together.
